name: Break the Block (itch) (Mitrand)
description:
Break The Block - is a fast and addictive game. The rules of the game are simple: Don't lose your balls! 

Break The Block is built for Android, but you can also play it in the browser.

*** Music *** 

Juhani Junkala (juhani.junkala@musician.org)

*** Sounds *** 

Little Robot Sound Factory (contact@littlerobotsoundfactory.com)
